com.teama.pds
Class Commander

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.Commander

public class Commander
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Grant Kurtz Maintains the requirement of calling each ActionNode in sequence, guaranteeing that the ActionNode is only executed once, in FIFO order.

Method Summary
 void addAction(ActionNode action)
          The passed action is placed at the end of our command list for processing.
static Commander createCommander()
          This method may only be called exactly once.
 Commander getCommander()
          Note: You MUST call createCommander before you can call this method.
 void run()
          Causes all the current actions to perform their respective roles once, in (FIFO) order.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

createCommander

public static Commander createCommander()
                                 throws AlreadyInstantiatedException
This method may only be called exactly once.

Returns:
returns a newly created singleton Commander Object, otherwise will returned an already previously created Commander Object.
Throws:
AlreadyInstantiatedException - This is thrown if this method has already been called once before.

getCommander

public Commander getCommander()
                       throws NotInstantiatedException
Note: You MUST call createCommander before you can call this method.

Returns:
The already instantiated Commander instance.
Throws:
NotInstantiatedException - This is thrown if createCommander was not called.

addAction

public void addAction(ActionNode action)
The passed action is placed at the end of our command list for processing.

Parameters:
action - the new action to add to the end of our command list

run

public void run()
Causes all the current actions to perform their respective roles once, in (FIFO) order.
